about_the_game:
Cauldron Tale is a story-driven farming sim where you play as a witch/warlock who has moved to the mystical village of Charmroot after mysteriously losing your magic. Build your farm, brew potions, solve the mystery, and explore the world and characters of Charmroot, all at your own pace!

The unthinkable has happened… You've lost your magic!

In a land of witches and other fantasy folk, this is not good. You pack your bags and move for a fresh start to Charmroot, a village at the base of a mystical lake. In exchange for your help brewing potions for the town, you're gifted a homestead and a wise-cracking cauldron named Rusty. As you settle into your new life and investigate the cause of your lost magic, you also uncover links to age-old lore and ancient gods based on five elements – Fire, Water, Wind, Earth, and a long forgotten magic.

Enjoy the cozy farm life

  • Grow and forage a variety of seasonal crops, including fantasy variants such as Griffin Orchids and Elven Berries

  • Raise animals and pets, and if you're lucky enough you may even encounter a magical creature or two

  • Participate in fun, unique seasonal festivals and mini-games like broom racing

Hone your (witch)craft

  • Brew potions, cook, and craft - all with the help of your cauldron sidekick, Rusty!

  • Regain your lost magic to help you get around town and enhance your farming and potion-making

Explore Charmroot

  • Follow the main quest line by uncovering and deciphering information and age-old lore

  • Unlock new areas as you investigate the cause of your lost magic

Get to know the townsfolk

  • Meet fun witchy and fantasy characters, each with their own unique personalities

  • Complete character side quests to learn more about their back stories and dreams

  • ... and perhaps even find love with one of several marriage candidates!
